snippet.title: Snowtopia: alpha announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Snowtopia is a ski resort management and construction game. The alpha is only available on Windows for now but soon on mac and linux!
For more information, check out our website: https://www.playsnowtopia.com/

Suscribe to the newsletter: http://eepurl.com/dOy2K9
Twitter: https://twitter.com/teafortwogames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playsnowtopia
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/snowtopia
Itchio: https://teafortwogames.itch.io/snowtopia
